message:
Dear {{ doc.applicant_name }},

We are pleased to invite you to take the screening test as the next step in the recruitment process for the position of {{ doc.designation }}.

Please click the link below to begin your test:

If you have any questions, feel free to reach out.

Best regards,
The Recruitment Team
name: Screen Test Invitation
subject: Screen Test Invitation for Your Job Application at {{ doc.custom_company }}
